headline: Newell's Smart Productivity Moves Likely to Offset Cost Pressures
summary: NWL boosts profitability through productivity gains, automation, cost control and strategic supply-chain improvements.

headline: HALEON APPOINTS CARL HANEY AS CHIEF R&D OFFICER
summary: Haleon (LSE: HLN) (NYSE: HLN) today announces the appointment of Carl Haney as Chief Research & Development Officer. Carl will join Haleon on 1 August 2025.

raw.headline: HALEON APPOINTS CARL HANEY AS CHIEF R&D OFFICER

headline: Kimberly-Clark: Powering Care And Suzano Partnership Essential For Reviving Margins
summary: Kimberly-Clark's cost-saving plans aim for $200M in SG&A by 2027, boosted by global tissue market growth. Find out why KMB is an attractive long-term investment.
